name: Joly is chased by the evil octopus empire and a tender piranha
name_original: Joly is chased by the evil octopus empire and a tender piranha
description:
Joly is chased by the evil octopus empire and a tender piranha is a game developed by pikifrijol. It was originally released in 2019.
Joly is chased by the evil octopus empire and a tender piranha is available on PC and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
